How are you doing today ? __eou__ I'm doing great , thanks for asking ! __eou__ That's wonderful to hear . __eou__
Can you help me with this problem ? __eou__ Of course , what do you need ? __eou__ I need to find the nearest hospital . __eou__ There's one on Main Street , about 5 minutes away . __eou__
I promise I'll be there by 8 . __eou__ Great , see you then ! __eou__
This is terrible news . __eou__ I know , I'm so sorry . __eou__ What are we going to do ? __eou__ We'll figure it out together . __eou__
